name: Twenty
title: twenty.com
shortDescription: Twenty is a modern, powerful CRM platform designed for fast-growing companies. It allows businesses to manage their customer relationships efficiently with customizable workflows and extensive data fields. Ideal for companies looking to maintain control over their customer data, Twenty offers a flexible solution adaptable to unique business needs.
cons: Less support compared to paid CRMs

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: HubSpot CRM
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers free CRM with marketing tools

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Zoho CRM
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Good for small to medium businesses
